description:
Try Youtubedl Official GUI app here:-

App name: 4ktube
summary: Very hard to manage cli tool

description:
For some reason, I couldn't get the standard youtube-dl to work for many videos using the standard Ubuntu install (out of date..?), but this version works fine.

I may not be using some of the fancier improvements just yet, but simply getting the standard functions to work is a boon.

Many thanks!

When Youtube-DL stopped working on my system, I was desperate for an alternative, and Yt-dlp more than delivers. I've been using it regularly for several months now, and I honestly don't know where I'd be without it :'D
